thread.section_title: Eagle-Eye Tours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle-Eye Tours | eagle-eye.com
thread.title: Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text:
I went on the 2016 "Into the NorthWest Passage" trip. All pre-trip organising by Eagle-Eye Tours was smooth and efficient, with the friendliest of staff. As Eagle Eye Tours is a small family-run company, I felt like I was part of them when we were on the Ocean Adventure ship.
Eagle-Eye owners, with their children, were in the zodiac with me when we were surrounded by 50 belugas! A once in a lifetime experience!
